data.actual_result: Discord shows you the "You must be friends with user to start a group dm" screen
data.expected_result: You're able to add users to the group DM
data.short_description: Unable to add friends to a group DM if the only other member is not on your friend's list
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a group DM with two other people - Remove one user from the group DM, and remove the other user from your friend's list - Enter the group DM overview, and attempt to add users to the group DM
